madeForCreators: Made for local creators with full support for English and Russian speech
upTo5Clips: Up to 5 viral clips per video
dropMedia: Drop your media file here, or browse
supportsFiles: Supports video files (MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WEBM) and audio files (MP3, WAV, M4A, AAC, FLAC)
removeFillersDesc: Automatically detect and remove 'um', 'uh', and other filler words from speech.
notFoundDesc: The page you're looking for seems to have vanished into the digital void. Don't worry, even the best explorers sometimes take a wrong turn.
thisIsAPlaceholderForYourProjects: This is a placeholder for your projects. You can integrate your API here to display user projects.
useSearchTermStateForFilteringProjects: Use the searchTerm state for filtering projects
useProjectsViewStateToSwitchBetweenGridL: Use the projectsView state to switch between grid/list layout
uploadVideoDescription: Upload a video and our AI will instantly generate multiple short-form clips ready for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.
dropVideoHere: Drop your video file here, or browse
supportsVideoFiles: Supports MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WEBM files
proAudioEnhancementDesc: Removes filler words, long pauses, background noise, and normalizes audio levels for crystal-clear Russian and English speech
autoVideoAssemblyDesc: Seamlessly stitches together video fragments for smooth storytelling flow
viralClipsGeneratorDesc: Creates engaging short-form content for TikTok, Reels, and YouTube Shorts with trending music
oneClickExportDesc: Export in multiple formats optimized for different social media platforms
watchHowOurAiTransforms: Watch how our AI transforms a raw 60-minute podcast into a polished episode plus 5 viral clips in under 3 minutes.
joinThousandsOfCreators: Join thousands of creators who save hours every week with AI-powered editing. Start your free trial today - no credit card required.
noCreditCardRequired: ✓ No credit card required  ✓ Cancel anytime
yourVideoHasBeenSuccessfullyProcessed: Your video has been successfully processed.
shortsGeneratedSuccessfully: Your shorts have been generated successfully! Check your downloads or the specified output location.
